definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: a crushing, but only concrete of that which is crushed, groats, grits (cf. Ar. jari4a, NH [[גְּרִיס]], Aram. (rare) [[גִּרְשָׂא]], [[גְּרוּסְיׇא]] gorso0)—[[אָבִיב קָלוּי בָּאֵשׁ גֶּרֶשׂ כַּרְמֶל]] Le 2:14 young ears parched with fire, groats (&) fresh fruit (v. Sifra ad loc.); ([[וּמִשַּׁמְנׇהּ]])[[מִגִּרְשָׂהּ ]] Le 2:16.
